name: Beat Bird
description:
Beat Bird is a fan game based on Flappy Bird, and Capcom's Mega Man 8.

You play as Beat, Mega Man's bird companion, and the object is to gather the energy orbs and avoid the obstacles!

The game features a personal high score system, smooth game play, and a nice BGM cover by Ubaldo B! You can check out more of his music here: https://www.youtube.com/c/UbaldoB and here: https://ubaldob.bandcamp.com/

I made this game in Godot, to improve my proficiency with the engine. I plan to make more practice games in between the major games that I have currently in development.

Thanks for checking out this game!

Beat, Mega Man and all  related graphics and sounds are owned by Capcom, and sourced by Sprites Inc.

Background graphic and font is sourced by Kaan Alpar

Based on tutorial by Kaan Alpar

BGM "Tengu Man" Mega Man & Bass cover created by Ubaldo B and used with permission. (Thanks Ubaldo!!!)

Original Flappy Bird created by Dong Nguyen

Beat Bird is not endorsed by Capcom or anyone else. This game was made purely for educational purposes.
